name: AddNoteToSubscriber
description:
Add a new note for a specific subscriber in Mailchimp.

Use this tool to add a note to a subscriber's profile in a specific list on Mailchimp. This is useful for keeping track of important information or interactions related to the subscriber.

parameters.name: list_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Mailchimp list. This is required to add a note to a subscriber's profile in the specified list.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: subscriber_email_hash
parameters.description: MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the subscriber's email address.

value_schema.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address.

parameters.name: subscriber_note_content
parameters.description: The content of the note for a subscriber. It must be limited to 1,000 characters.

value_schema.description: The content of the note. Note length is limited to 1,000 characters.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the list.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: subscriber_hash
parameters.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address.

value_schema.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address.

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: The content of the note. Note length is limited to 1,000 characters.

value_schema.description: The content of the note. Note length is limited to 1,000 characters.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
